intro.title: Calculator Introduction
intro.description: This calculator is a specialized version of the general time value calculator, focused on evaluating taxi rides. For evaluating whether it's worth spending time on discounts or activities, please use the general version {taxiCalculator}. By calculating your hourly wage value, it helps you make smarter decisions.

usage.title: How to Use This Calculator?
steps: Enter Salary: Input your salary into the calculator.
Enter Fare: Input the estimated taxi fare.
Time Saved: Enter how much time you'll save compared to public transport.

concept.title: Why Use "Hourly Wage Thinking"?
concept.description: The focus of "hourly wage thinking" is on the value of time, specifically how much value can be created per hour. With this mindset, you can clearly understand which activities are worth investing in and which are a waste of time.
benefits: Smarter Transport Choices: Make decisions based on actual data.
Time Management Optimization: Choose faster transport options when appropriate.
Avoid Overspending: Opt for economical transport when time value is lower.
concept.conclusion: Use this calculator to make more efficient use of your time and money in transportation choices.
